name: IntersectionEclaireStudyTitleTypeCSAndEclaireStudyTitleTypeCS
title: Intersection of Définition des types de titre pour l'essai And Définition des types de titre pour l'essai

concept.definition: Main title for common use. The primary title used for representation if multiple titles exist.
Title using language common to lay public discourse.
Brief title (e.g. 'running title' or title used in page headers)

concept.display: Different text in an earlier version
concept.definition: Alternative form of title in an earlier version such as epub ahead of print.
Additional form of title in a different language.
Machine translated form of title in a different language, language element codes the language into which it was translated by machine.

concept.display: Different text for the same object with a different identifier
concept.definition: An alternative form of the title in two or more entries, e.g. in multiple medline entries
